Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Events

package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Events
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    ClientEventHandler
    Interface implemented by classes of the controller that will handle events sent by the client
    ServerEventObserver
    Interface implemented by classes of the controller which will handle events sent by the server (like the virtual view, or in the client)
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ActivatedProductionEvent
    client to server event triggered when the player wants to activate production
    ActivatedProductionEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when the player has activated production
    BoughtCardEvent
    client to server event triggered when the player has bought a Development card
    BoughtCardEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when the player has bought a Development card
    ClientEvent
    abstract class extended with all the client events
    EndGameEventS2C
    serve to client event triggered when the game ends
    EndPreparationEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when all the players have finished their initial choices it sends everyone's warehouse, together with everyone's Leader cards when this events is reached by the client, it means the "real" game starts and it's the first player's turn
    EndTurnEvent
    client to server event triggered when the player ends his turn
    GameStarterEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when the game starts
    IllegalActionEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when an illegal action happens
    IncrementPositionEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when a player has moved his Faith track position
    InitialChoiceEvent
    client to server event triggered for the initial choice of Leader cards to be removed and resources to be put in the warehouse
    LeaderCardActionEvent
    client to server event triggered when the player has activated/discarded a Leader card
    LeaderCardActionEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when the current player has activated/discarded a Leader card and it is necessary to communicate it to every player
    LorenzoTurnEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when it's Lorenzo's turn
    NewConnectionEvent
    client to server event triggered when a new player has connected
    NewConnectionEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when a new player has connected, it communicates the nickname (in fact it could have been edited in respect to the choice of the player) and if it's the first player or not
    NewTurnEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when a new turn happens
    NumPlayerEvent
    client to server event triggered when the first connected client chooses the number of players for the game
    PingEventC2S
     
    PingEventS2C
     
    ServerEvent
    messages from server to client
    ServerEventCreator
     
    ServerObservable
     
    UseMarketEvent
    client to server event triggered when the player wants to use the market
    UseMarketEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when the player has used the market
    VaticanReportEventS2C
    server to client event triggered when a Vatican report happens
